.. _modelref:

****************
Model References
****************

Supported Groups and Models

+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|      Group       |                   Models                   |
+==================+============================================+
|  ACLine          | Line                                       |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  ACTopology      | Bus                                        |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  Calculation     | COI                                        |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  Collection      | Area                                       |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  DCLink          | Ground, R, L, C, RCp, RCs, RLs, RLCs, RLCp |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  DCTopology      | Node                                       |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  Exciter         | EXDC2                                      |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  Experimental    | PI2                                        |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  FreqMeasurement | BusFreq, BusROCOF                          |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  PSS             | IEEEST                                     |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  StaticACDC      | VSCShunt                                   |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  StaticGen       | PV, Slack                                  |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  StaticLoad      | PQ                                         |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  StaticShunt     | Shunt                                      |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  SynGen          | GENCLS, GENROU                             |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  TimedEvent      | Toggler, Fault                             |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
|  TurbineGov      | TG2, TGOV1                                 |
+------------------+--------------------------------------------+
